meanings.definition: A person or group that establishes something.
meanings.sent1: The establishers of the new company worked tirelessly to set it up.
meanings.sent2: The establishers of the club were excited to see their vision come to life.
meanings.sent3: The establishers of the secret hideout made sure it had a trapdoor for fun.
meanings.sent4: The establishers of the charity laid the foundation for a brighter future.
meanings.sent5: The establishers of the town left a lasting legacy for generations to come.

meanings.definition: The act of establishing or setting up something.
meanings.sent1: The establishers of the rules ensured fairness for all.
meanings.sent2: The establishers of the event planned every detail meticulously.
meanings.sent3: The establishers of the bake-off made sure there were enough ovens.
meanings.sent4: The establishers of the tradition passed down their knowledge with care.
meanings.sent5: The establishers of the garden created a beautiful oasis in the city.
